EmailTemplate.subject: Here is your first look at Live Different's 2016/2017 presentation theme.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope you're doing well. We've just announced our presentation theme for 2016/2017 and wanted to make sure your school received the information right away. Below, I've included an explanation of our upcoming presentation "Fix The Focus: Choosing Empathy First" and the goals we have for what is sure to be another exciting season of life change and empowered youth.
We'd absolutely love to visit {!Account.Name} again and dates are starting to fill up earlier than normal, so feel free to respond to this email and I'll be happy to provide you with a current list of our availability in your area and answer any questions you might have.
Thanks so much {!Contact.FirstName}, I look forward to hearing from you soon.
*********** Our goal is to inspire your students to adopt a lifestyle of empathy and compassion for others. Establishing a fundamental understanding of empathy, we will practically equip them with empathic skills that they can continue to practice and develop. Cultivating empathy is one of the most significant keys to creating a compassionate, connected and resilient student body.
Engage We are wired to be empathic; our brains naturally mirror the emotions and feelings of others. Our goal is to help students understand how empathy works and how they can consciously engage this capacity to be care for others.
Listen By understanding and exploring active listening, students can uncover their potential to empathize and understand the people they interact with. This skill will help them cultivate stronger and more authentic relationships.
Connect We will help students understand the negative social process of othering (“us” vs. “them” thinking), and foster empathy by helping them see that we are all connected and far more similar than we are different.
Call now to book your presentation!
(866) 432 4464 ext. {!User.Extension}
